alert.note: Alert for McLeod; Meeker; Sherburne; Wright (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 3:20PM CST until December 28 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...Snow to taper off, Very cold overnight... .Wind chill temperatures to drop between -25F to -35F across portions of central and western Minnesota tonight. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Meeker and McLeod Counties. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
